title: Thomas Dimitroff on the Draft, the Falcons, and More
description:
Kevin and Nora are joined by former Falcons GM Thomas Dimitroff to talk about the NFL draft, including what the Falcons might do, trading in the draft, and more (09:00).
Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Guest: Thomas Dimitroff
Production Assistant: Jonathan Kermah
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
